resources.string: George V was the first Windsor monarch of the UK.
Nickname of President Duvalier of Haiti, who died in 1971 is Papa Johns.
The Battle of Lepanto of 1571 marked the end of the Ottoman naval supremacy in the Mediterranean
Nearly 30 years did it take Sir Francis Drake to complete the first circumnavigation of the globe in 1580
In 1816 Mississippi state was admitted to the Union as the 20th state.
Are you sure you want to do this?
